page.title: 11TOURISTS AND JOBS
page.content: Tourists bring in a big part of our income; each one is worth about Â£100. Nearly 14,000 people visit the town each summer making about Â£1,400,000. They provide jobs in gift shops etc. but these only last for the season. This is an advantage for the schoolchildren. The people who come are mainly young families and senior citizens. This is because Teignmouth is not exciting enough for the 18-29 age group. Teignmouth is not good for night-life because there is a lack of night-clubs and discos. There are not many hotels in Teignmouth, so the tourists stay in small family-run guest houses. Quite a lot of people use this as a second holiday. This means that in winter they go abroad and in summer they come to Teignmouth. This is another reason why there are only jobs in summer.
